code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Route,Routes,Link}from'react-router-dom';import HomePage from'./HomePage';import AddBookPage from'./AddBookPage';import EditBookPage from'./EditBookPage';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[books,setBooks]=useState([]);const addBook=book=>{setBooks([...books,book]);};const editBook=updatedBook=>{setBooks(books.map(book=>book.id===updatedBook.id?updatedBook:book));};const deleteBook=id=>{setBooks(books.filter(book=>book.id!==id));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"navbar navbar-expand-lg navbar-light bg-light",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"navbar-brand",to:"/",children:"Book List"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"collapse navbar-collapse",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"navbar-nav mr-auto",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"nav-link",to:"/",children:"Home"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"nav-link",to:"/add",children:"Add Book"})})]})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HomePage,{books:books,deleteBook:deleteBook})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/add",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AddBookPage,{addBook:addBook})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/edit/:id",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(EditBookPage,{books:books,editBook:editBook})})]})]});};export default App;
